moduleMetadataJson.name: OSX Gather Autologin Password as Root
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will steal the plaintext password of any user on the machine
        with autologin enabled. Root access is required.

        When a user has autologin enabled (System Preferences -> Accounts), OSX
        stores their password with an XOR encoding in /private/etc/kcpassword.
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
